content: inside sew together cm yarn tail inner petals pink row 1 chain 26 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each chain across 25 sts row 2 chain 1 make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 25 sts row 3 chain 1 turn make 1 slip_stitch in the first st make 1 half_double_crochet in the next st chain 1 make 1 double_crochet in the next st chain 1 make 1 half_double_crochet in the next st make 1 slip_stitch in the next st repeat 5 times 25 sts fasten_off and weave in the loosely roll up place inside and leave a 30 cm yarn starting yarn tail then weave the sew it in tail yarn tail back and forth to lock it in place if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
